Html: It seems like my method of including the DLL into my project is not working, i did it this way, dragged the DLL into the project then added a reference, then called the namespace with "using InputSimulator" and it does not work, any help would be much appreciated!
Any chance you could you share how you fixed this?  I have the same problem.
After import DLL adding a reference, you have to declare "using WindowsInput" and then you have available InputSimulator class.
